summary: Completed comprehensive testing of 60-Second Deep PRD Generator. Core functionality working perfectly - all 3 steps flow correctly, backend APIs functional, Gemini 2.5 flash integration working. Minor copy button issue identified.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Error handling tests timeout when processing empty/invalid requests
flaky_endpoints.impact: LLM takes time to process even invalid requests, causing timeouts

ui_bugs.issue: Copy to clipboard functionality fails - shows 'Failed to copy' toast

passed_tests: Backend API /api/ root endpoint returns correct response
Backend API /api/analyze generates 3 questions with proper structure and categories
Backend API /api/generate-prd creates comprehensive PRD (20,000+ characters)
Frontend loads with correct Obsidian dark theme (no purple colors)
Step 1: Idea input textarea and analyze button work correctly
Step 2: All 3 clarifying questions display and can be answered
Step 3: PRD output displays in proper markdown format
Progress indicator shows correct step progression
New PRD button resets flow back to Step 1
All data-testid attributes present and functional
success_percentage: Backend: 85% (5/7 tests passed), Frontend: 95% (12/13 tests passed)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix copy to clipboard functionality in PRDGenerator.jsx - the navigator.clipboard.writeText() call is failing and showing 'Failed to copy' toast
